sn33.6-10:0.3: 6–10. Five Discourses on Not Seeing Form, Etc.
sn33.6-10:1.2: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha:
sn33.6-10:1.3: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? …”
sn33.6-10:1.6: “Vaccha, it is because of not seeing form …
sn33.6-10:1.11: consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation …”
